name: Redneck Santa
description:
Kris Kringle has been working real hard for the big day and now he must deliver chewing tobacco and liquor to rednecks living in the local trailer park.

How to play:

WASD to move, Left Shift to run, ESC to close game.
Head down to your workshop and collect all the gifts, liquor & tobacco scattered all over the place. Bring the gifts to town before the time runs out.

PS. If you're offended by the rebel flag and the game's themes, don't bother playing.
